greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n*(n+1)/2} k * A214670(n,k).
program: (PARI) {a(n)=local(A214670=x*y); A214670=sum(m=1, n, -x^m*prod(j=1, m, (1-(1+y)^j)/(1-x*(1+y)^j))+x*O(x^n)); polcoeff(subst(deriv(A214670,y),y,1), n, x)}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 25 2012
